entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this morning. Rain beginning this morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections late this morning and this afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain ending before morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Wind becoming south 20 this evening then light before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 20 January 2023
